description: This file defines the interface IButler within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It specifies methods for managing value points, notifications for changes, and file operations, serving as a contract for implementing classes related to a 'butler' concept in the system.

classes.name: IButler
classes.description: Interface for managing value points and notifications within the system.

classes.name: IButler::INotification
classes.description: Interface for receiving notifications about changes to value points (added, removed, updated, metadata).

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Register an INotification sink to receive updates about value point changes.

methods.name: Element
methods.description: Retrieve a specific IValuePoint either by name or by ID.

methods.name: Source
methods.description: Get the source string for a given module.

methods.name: Branch
methods.description: Perform a branch operation at the specified path.

methods.name: Link
methods.description: Link a path to an ID.

methods.name: Move
methods.description: Move or rename a value point.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Delete a value point at the specified path.

methods.name: Orphans
methods.description: Retrieve an iterator over orphaned value points for a module.

ctags.name: IButler
ctags.pattern: /^		struct EXTERNAL IButler : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^			struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
